message.content:
<<<api>>>: Random
<<<code>>>: Random rand = new Random();
int randomButton = rand.nextInt(12); // generate a random number between 0 and 11
switch(randomButton) {
  case 0:
    b1.doClick(); // simulate a button click
    break;
  case 1:
    b2.doClick();
    break;
  // repeat for the rest of the buttons
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use the Random class to generate a random number between 0 and 11. Then, you can use a switch statement to simulate a button click based on the random number generated.
